alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 9:03PM MST until January 08 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SUNDAY TO MIDNIGHT MST SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Alpine, Buffalo Pass, Ganado, Pinetop- Lakeside, Show Low, Whiteriver and Window Rock. * WHEN...From 11 AM Sunday to midnight MST Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel will become nearly impossible on untreated roads due to snow and reduced visibility. Wind gusts over 50 mph could bring down tree branches. * SNOW TABLES...Snow forecast from 11 AM Sunday to midnight Monday: Alpine 2 to 4 inches Buffalo Pass 4 to 6 inches Ganado 3 to 5 inches Pinetop-Lkside 5 to 9 inches Show Low 4 to 6 inches Whiteriver 4 to 6 inches Window Rock 3 to 5 inches.
info.instruction: If travel is essential, allow for extra drive time and use caution. For the latest road conditions and closures...call the ADOT freeway management system at 1 888 411 7623 or visit their web site at www.az511.com. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
